languages.text: Idira is a psyker and an Operative. As an Operative, she can study opponents and identify their weaknesses, and her psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} allow her to deal damage to them. Analyse Enemies is an Operative ability which applies the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} to all enemies within the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The Operative can also use this ability against a specific enemy to inflict several stacks of this effect. The higher the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more exploit stacks will be inflicted. Whenever the Operative hits a target with an exploit applied to them, the attack deals additional damage. The amount of extra damage depends on the target's number of exploit stacks and the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Expose Weakness is an Operative ability which they can use against a single enemy who is under the exploit effect. This ability reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and armour. The amount of reduction depends on the number of active exploits on the enemy and the Operative's Perception.
languages.original_text: Идира — псайкер и адепт. Как адепт она способна изучать противников и выявлять их слабые места, нанося при этом урон псайкерскими способностями. Изучение целей — особая способность, которая в начале каждого хода адепта накладывает эффект "уязвимость" на всех врагов в его поле зрения. Адепт также может применить эту способность на одном конкретном враге, чтобы наложить на него несколько уровней эффекта. Чем выше бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g} адепта, тем больше уровней уязвимости он может наложить на врага. Когда адепт атакует врагов с уязвимостью, каждая атака наносит дополнительный урон. Величина дополнительного урона зависит от количества наложенных уязвимостей и от {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} адепта. Выявление слабостей — особая способность, которую адепт может использовать на одном враге с уязвимостью. {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}броня{/g} такого врага будут снижены. Величина снижения этих характеристик зависит от количества активированных на враге уязвимостей и от Восприятия адепта

traits.locale_text: Idira is a psyker and an Adept. As an Adept, she can study her enemies for weaknesses, and as a psyker, she can assault them with psychic powers. Study Enemies is an Adept ability that applies the exploit effect to all enemies within the Adept's line of sight at the start of each of the Adept's turns. The Adept can also use this ability against a specific enemy to inflict several stacks of this effect. The higher the Adept's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus is, the more exploit stacks will be inflicted. Whenever the Adept hits a target with an exploit applied to them, the attack deals additional damage. The amount of extra damage depends on the number of applied exploit stacks and the Adept's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Expose Weakness is an Adept ability they can use against a single enemy who is under the exploit effect. This ability reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}armour{/g}. The amount of reduction depends on the number of active exploits on the enemy and the Adept's Perception.

Idira is a psyker and an Adept. As an Adept, she can study her enemies for weaknesses, and as a psyker, she can assault them with psychic powers. Study Enemies is an Adept ability that applies the exploit effect to all enemies within the Adept's line of sight at the start of each of the Adept's turns. The Adept can also use this ability against a specific enemy to inflict several stacks of this effect. The higher the Adept's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus is, the more exploit stacks will be inflicted. Whenever the Adept hits a target with an exploit applied to them, the attack deals additional damage. The amount of extra damage depends on the number of applied exploit stacks and the Adept's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Expose Weakness is an Adept ability they can use against a single enemy who is under the exploit effect. This ability reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}armour{/g}. The amount of reduction depends on the number of active exploits on the enemy and the Adept's Perception.

Idira is a psyker and an Adept. As an Adept, she can study opponents and identify their weaknesses, and her psyker abilities allow her to deal damage to them. Study Enemies is an Adept ability which applies the exploit effect to all enemies within the Adept's line of sight at the start of each of the Adept's turns. The Adept can also use this ability against a specific enemy to inflict several stacks of this effect. The higher the Adept's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus is, the more exploit stacks will be inflicted. Whenever the Adept hits a target with an exploit applied to them, the attack deals additional damage. The amount of extra damage depends on the target's number of exploit stacks and the Adept's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Expose Weakness is an Adept ability which they can use against a single enemy who is under the exploit effect. This ability reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}armour{/g}. The amount of reduction depends on the number of active exploits on the enemy and the Adept's Perception.

Analyse Enemies is an Operative ability which applies the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} to all enemies within the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The Operative can also use this ability against a specific enemy to inflict several stacks of this effect. Whenever the Operative hits a target with an exploit applied to them, the attack deals additional damage. The amount of extra damage depends on the target's number of exploit stacks and the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Expose Weakness is an Operative ability which they can use against a single enemy who is under the exploit effect. This ability reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and armour. The amount of reduction depends on the number of active exploits on the enemy and the Operative's Perception.

languages.text: Идира — псайкер и оперативник. Как оперативник она способна изучать противников и выявлять их слабые места, нанося при этом урон псайкерскими способностями. Анализ целей — особая способность, которая в начале каждого хода оперативника накладывает эффект "уязвимость" на всех врагов в его поле зрения. Оперативник также может применить эту способность на одном конкретном враге, чтобы наложить на него несколько уровней эффекта. Чем выше бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g} оперативника, тем больше уровней уязвимости он может наложить на врага. Когда оперативник атакует врагов с уязвимостью, каждая атака наносит дополнительный урон. Величина дополнительного урона зависит от количества наложенных уязвимостей и от {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} оперативника. Выявление слабостей — особая способность, которую оперативник может использовать на одном враге с уязвимостью. {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}броня{/g} такого врага будут снижены. Величина снижения этих характеристик зависит от количества активированных на враге уязвимостей и от Восприятия оперативника.

Idira es una psíquica y agente. Como agente, puede estudiar a sus enemigos e identificar sus debilidades, mientras que sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de psíquica le permiten infligirles daño. Analizar enemigos es una capacidad de agente que aplica el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} a todos los enemigos en la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del agente al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del agente. El agente también puede usar la capacidad contra un enemigo concreto para infligir varias acumulaciones del efecto. Cuanto mayor sea la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} del agente, más acumulaciones de vulnerabilidad aplica. Cuando el agente alcanza a un objetivo con una vulnerabilidad aplicada, el ataque inflige daño adicional. La cantidad de daño adicional depende de la cantidad de acumulaciones de vulnerabilidad y de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del agente. Exponer debilidad es una capacidad de agente que puede usar contra un único enemigo con el efecto de vulnerabilidad. Esta capacidad reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y la armadura del enemigo. La magnitud de la reducción depende del número de vulnerabilidades activas del enemigo y la Percepción del agente.
languages.original_text: Idira is a psyker and an Operative. As an Operative, she can study opponents and identify their weaknesses, and her psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} allow her to deal damage to them. Analyse Enemies is an Operative ability which applies the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} to all enemies within the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The amount of reduction depends on the number of active exploits on the enemy and the Operative's Perception.

traits.locale_text: Idira es una psíquica y adepta. Como adepta, puede estudiar a sus enemigos e identificar sus debilidades, mientras que sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de psíquica le permiten infligirles daño. Estudiar enemigos es una capacidad de adepto que aplica el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} a todos los enemigos en la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} del adepto al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del adepto. El adepto también puede usar la capacidad contra un enemigo concreto para infligir varias acumulaciones del efecto. Cuanto mayor sea la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} del adepto, más acumulaciones de vulnerabilidad aplica. Cuando el adepto {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}alcanza{/g} a un objetivo con una vulnerabilidad aplicada, el ataque inflige daño adicional. La cantidad de daño adicional depende de la cantidad de acumulaciones de vulnerabilidad y de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del adepto. Exponer debilidad es una capacidad de adepto que puede usar contra un único enemigo con el efecto de vulnerabilidad. Esta capacidad reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} del enemigo. La magnitud de la reducción depende del número de vulnerabilidades activas del enemigo y la Percepción del adepto.

languages.text: イディラは異能者であり、オペレーターである。オペレーターである彼女は対戦相手を研究し、弱点を特定することができる。また、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}により、対戦相手にダメージを与えることができる。 敵の分析はオペレーターのアビリティである。オペレーターの各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に、オペレーターの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}にいるすべての敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を適用する。オペレーターは、このアビリティを特定の敵に使用し、この効果を数スタック与えることもできる。オペレーターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が高ければ高いほど、より多くのエクスプロイトのスタックが与えられる。 オペレーターがエクスプロイトを適用されたターゲットに命中させるたびに、その攻撃は追加ダメージを与える。追加ダメージの量は、ターゲットのエクスプロイトのスタック数とオペレーターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}によって変わる。 弱点の露呈はオペレーターのアビリティで、エクスプロイト効果下にある敵1体に対して使用できる。このアビリティは、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、アーマーを減少させる。 減少量は敵の有効なエクスプロイトの数とオペレーターの知覚によって変わる。
languages.original_text: Idira is a psyker and an Operative. As an Operative, she can study opponents and identify their weaknesses, and her psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} allow her to deal damage to them. Analyse Enemies is an Operative ability which applies the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} to all enemies within the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The Operative can also use this ability against a specific enemy to inflict several stacks of this effect. The higher the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more exploit stacks will be inflicted. Whenever the Operative hits a target with an exploit applied to them, the attack deals additional damage. The amount of extra damage depends on the target's number of exploit stacks and the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Expose Weakness is an Operative ability which they can use against a single enemy who is under the exploit effect. This ability reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and armour. The amount of reduction depends on the number of active exploits on the enemy and the Operative's Perception.

traits.locale_text: イディラは異能者であり、アデプトである。アデプトである彼女は対戦相手を研究し、弱点を特定することができる。また、異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}により、対戦相手にダメージを与えることができる。 敵の研究はアデプトのアビリティである。アデプトの各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に、アデプトの{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}にいるすべての敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を適用する。アデプトはこのアビリティを特定の敵に使用し、この効果を数スタック与えることもできる。アデプトの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が高ければ高いほど、より多くのエクスプロイトのスタックが与えられる。 アデプトがエクスプロイトを適用されたターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させるたびに、その攻撃は追加ダメージを与える。追加ダメージの量は、ターゲットのエクスプロイトのスタック数とアデプトの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}によって変わる。 弱点の露呈はアデプトのアビリティで、エクスプロイト効果下にある敵1体に対して使用できる。このアビリティは、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}を減少させる。 減少量は敵の有効なエクスプロイトの数とアデプトの知覚によって変わる。

languages.text: 伊迪拉是位灵能者，也是位特工。身为特工，她可以对敌人进行研究，找到敌人的弱点，而她的灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}则可以对敌人造成伤害。 分析敌人是特工的能力。特工的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会对{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内的所有敌人施加1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。特工还可以对特定某位敌人使用此项能力，叠加多层“研究”效果。特工的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}越高，叠加的“研究”效果层数越多。 每当特工命中带有“研究”效果的目标时，都会造成额外伤害。额外伤害取决于目标的“研究”层数与特工的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}。 暴露弱点是特工的能力，特工可以使用此项能力对付带有“研究”效果的单体敌人。此能力可以降低敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与护甲。 减弱效果取决于该名敌人身上的“研究”效果层数与特工的感知。
languages.original_text: Idira is a psyker and an Operative. As an Operative, she can study opponents and identify their weaknesses, and her psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} allow her to deal damage to them. Analyse Enemies is an Operative ability which applies the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} to all enemies within the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The Operative can also use this ability against a specific enemy to inflict several stacks of this effect. The higher the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more exploit stacks will be inflicted. Whenever the Operative hits a target with an exploit applied to them, the attack deals additional damage. The amount of extra damage depends on the target's number of exploit stacks and the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Expose Weakness is an Operative ability which they can use against a single enemy who is under the exploit effect. This ability reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and armour. The amount of reduction depends on the number of active exploits on the enemy and the Operative's Perception.

traits.locale_text: 伊迪拉是位灵能者，也是位技师。身为技师，她可以对敌人进行研究，找到敌人的弱点，而她的灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}则可以对敌人造成伤害。 研究敌人是技师的能力。技师的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会对{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内的所有敌人施加1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。技师还可以对特定某位敌人使用此项能力，叠加多层“研究”效果。技师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}越高，叠加的“研究”效果层数越多。 每当技师{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}带有“研究”效果的目标时，都会造成额外伤害。额外伤害取决于目标的“研究”层数与技师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}。 暴露弱点是技师的能力，技师可以使用此项能力对付带有“研究”效果的单体敌人。此能力可以降低敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}。 减弱效果取决于该名敌人身上的“研究”效果层数与技师的感知。

languages.text: Idira ist eine Psionikerin und Agentin. Als Agentin kann sie Gegner studieren und ihre Schwächen erkennen, und ihre Psioniker-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} erlauben es ihr, ihnen Schaden zuzufügen. Feinde analysieren ist eine Fähigkeit des Agenten, die den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} auf alle Feinde in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Agenten anwendet. Der Agent kann diese Fähigkeit auch gegen einen bestimmten Feind einsetzen, um mehrere Stapel dieses Effekts anzuwenden. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Agenten ist, desto mehr Ausnutzen-Stapel werden angewendet. Immer wenn der Agent ein Ziel trifft, auf das Ausnutzen angewendet wurde, verursacht der Angriff zusätzlichen Schaden. Die Höhe des zusätzlichen Schadens hängt von der Anzahl der Ausnutzen-Stapel des Ziels und der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Agenten ab. Schwäche offenlegen ist eine Fähigkeit des Agenten, die er gegen einen einzelnen Feind einsetzen kann, der unter dem Ausnutzen-Effekt steht. Diese Fähigkeit reduziert {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und Rüstung des Feindes. Die Höhe der Reduktion hängt von der Anzahl der aktiven Ausnutzen-Effekte des Feindes und der Wahrnehmung des Agenten ab.
languages.original_text: Idira is a psyker and an Operative. As an Operative, she can study opponents and identify their weaknesses, and her psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} allow her to deal damage to them. Analyse Enemies is an Operative ability which applies the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} to all enemies within the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The Operative can also use this ability against a specific enemy to inflict several stacks of this effect. The higher the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more exploit stacks will be inflicted. Whenever the Operative hits a target with an exploit applied to them, the attack deals additional damage. The amount of extra damage depends on the target's number of exploit stacks and the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Expose Weakness is an Operative ability which they can use against a single enemy who is under the exploit effect. This ability reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and armour. The amount of reduction depends on the number of active exploits on the enemy and the Operative's Perception.

traits.locale_text: Idira ist eine Psionikerin und Adeptin. Als Adeptin kann sie Gegner studieren und ihre Schwächen erkennen, und ihre Psioniker-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} erlauben es ihr, ihnen Schaden zuzufügen. Gegner studieren ist eine Adeptenfähigkeit, die den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} auf alle Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Adepten anwendet. Der Adept kann diese Fähigkeit auch gegen einen bestimmten Gegner einsetzen, um diesen Effekt mehrfach anzuwenden. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Adepten ist, desto mehr Ausnutzen-Effekte werden aufaddiert. Immer wenn der Adept ein Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, auf das Ausnutzen angewendet wurde, verursacht der Angriff zusätzlichen Schaden. Die Höhe des zusätzlichen Schadens hängt von der Anzahl der aufaddierten Ausnutzen-Effekte des Ziels und der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Adepten ab. Schwäche aufdecken ist eine Fähigkeit des Adepten, die er gegen einen einzelnen Gegner einsetzen kann, der unter dem Ausnutzen-Effekt steht. Diese Fähigkeit reduziert {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} des Gegners. Die Höhe der Reduzierung hängt von der Anzahl der aktiven Ausnutzen-Effekte des Gegners und der Wahrnehmung des Adepten ab.

languages.text: Idira est une psyker et une Opérateur. En tant qu'Opérateur, elle peut étudier ses adversaires et identifier leurs faiblesses, et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de psyker lui permettent de leur infliger des dégâts. Étude des ennemis est une capacité d'Opérateur qui applique l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} à tous les ennemis dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} de l'Opérateur au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}. L'Opérateur peut également utiliser cette capacité contre un ennemi spécifique pour lui infliger plusieurs cumuls de cet effet. Plus le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de l'Opérateur est élevé, plus les exploits sont nombreux. Chaque fois que l'Opérateur touche une cible à laquelle un exploit a été appliqué, l'attaque inflige des dégâts supplémentaires. La quantité de dégâts supplémentaires dépend du nombre d'exploits de la cible et de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'Opérateur. Mise en Évidence des Points Faibles est une capacité de l'Opérateur et celui-ci peut l'utiliser contre un ennemi sous l'effet d'un exploit. Cette capacité réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et l'armure de l'ennemi. Cette réduction dépend du nombre d'exploits actifs sur l'ennemi et de la Perception de l'Opérateur.
languages.original_text: Idira is a psyker and an Operative. As an Operative, she can study opponents and identify their weaknesses, and her psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} allow her to deal damage to them. Analyse Enemies is an Operative ability which applies the {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} to all enemies within the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of each of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. The Operative can also use this ability against a specific enemy to inflict several stacks of this effect. The higher the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is, the more exploit stacks will be inflicted. Whenever the Operative hits a target with an exploit applied to them, the attack deals additional damage. The amount of extra damage depends on the target's number of exploit stacks and the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Expose Weakness is an Operative ability which they can use against a single enemy who is under the exploit effect. This ability reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and armour. The amount of reduction depends on the number of active exploits on the enemy and the Operative's Perception.

traits.locale_text: Idira est une psyker et une Adept. En tant qu'Adepte, elle peut étudier ses adversaires et identifier leurs faiblesses, et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de psyker lui permettent de leur infliger des dégâts. Étude des ennemis est une capacité d'Adepte qui applique l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} à tous les ennemis dans la {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} de l'Adepte au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}. L'Adepte peut également utiliser cette capacité contre un ennemi spécifique pour lui infliger plusieurs salves de cet effet. Plus le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de l'Adepte est élevé, plus les exploits sont nombreux. Chaque fois que l'Adepte {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} une cible à laquelle un exploit a été appliqué, l'attaque inflige des dégâts supplémentaires. La quantité de dégâts supplémentaires dépend du nombre d'exploits de la cible et de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'Adepte. Mise en Évidence des Points Faibles est une capacité de l'Adepte et celui-ci peut l’utiliser contre un ennemi sous l'effet d'un exploit. Cette capacité réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et l’{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de l’ennemi. Cette réduction dépend du nombre d'exploits actifs sur l'ennemi et de la Perception de l'Adepte.

L'Adepte peut également utiliser cette capacité contre un ennemi spécifique pour lui infliger plusieurs salves de cet effet. Plus le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de l'Adepte est élevé, plus les exploits sont nombreux. Chaque fois que l'Adepte touche une cible à laquelle un exploit a été appliqué, l'attaque inflige des dégâts supplémentaires. Cette capacité réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et l'armure de l'ennemi.
